title: Holy Sh*t the Master sword sucks in this game...
body: This thing has only 30 damage, and it breaks. Almost all of my guardian++ weapons do more damage than this thing (except the spear, but all spears have sh*t damage anyways), and I'm sure there are other weapons I've found that do more than 30 damage (can't think of any atm though). What's the point of using this thing?
